name: LeapIn
description: We’re working on a vision to bring the National Disability Strategy to life by making it easy to navigate the NDIS and implement personal goals and plans.Leap in! offers a unique, digital-based platform that connects Australians with disabilities, providers and the community groups who support them, all in one delightfully simple place.
Headline: Unlock your NDIS with Leap in!
ShortDescription: Leap in! is a registered charity and a NDIS-registered plan manager.

Highlights.name: Understanding NDIS
Highlights.description: This article provides information about the NDIS (National Disability Insurance Scheme) and how it can benefit people with disabilities.

Highlights.name: Leap in! - Your NDIS Plan Management Partner
Highlights.description: Leap in! is a company that helps people with disabilities navigate the NDIS. They offer a free app and resources to assist you in managing your NDIS plan.

Highlights.name: Award-Winning Services
Highlights.description: Leap in! was recognized as the Most Outstanding Plan Management company, highlighting their exceptional service in the field.

enhanced_description: LeapIn is a digital-based platform and NDIS-registered plan manager focused on simplifying the National Disability Insurance Scheme (NDIS) for Australians with disabilities. As a registered charity, it aims to help users navigate the NDIS, implement personal goals, and manage their plans. The platform connects individuals with disabilities, NDIS providers, and supporting community groups. It offers plan management services, e-learning resources, and a magazine, accessible via a free app, having been recognized as an award-winning plan management company.
key_use_cases: Connecting NDIS participants with providers and community groups
Implementing personal goals and plans related to NDIS
competitive_advantages: Award-winning services (Most Outstanding Plan Management company)
Unique, digital-based platform for NDIS management
Offers a free app and resources
roi_benefits: Facilitates achievement of personal goals and plans
Improved access to NDIS support and resources
primary_users: Community groups supporting individuals with disabilities
compliance_features: NDIS compliance (as a registered plan manager)
